content: sm slip marker yo yarnover k2tog knit 2 sts together decrease ssk slip slip knit slipped sts tbl decrease m1r right slanting increase make one right lift loop between stitches on left needle inserting the needle from back to front knit into the front of loop m1l left slanting increase make one left lift loop between stitches on left needle inserting the needle from front to back knit into the back of loop pattern copyright © veera välimäki the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern or sell items that are knitted from this pattern for any questions please contact veera 100rain@gmail com 100-rain blogspot com
